text:
I really enjoyed working on my short film, it was a solo project, so very intense production period, but incredibly fun.
I think working as a team you can tackle bigger ideas since you can rely on your teammates, you seem to be dividing the tasks and focusing which is great to get the best result :smiley:
And it's fun to check back to your first version and see how much it improved, it's insane where the process can take you.
And that sucks to hear about you're back condition! A lot of people here at the office have standing desks, I'm surprised the school can't provide you with an option.
And keep in mind my draw overs are just ideas, and super rough posing, I'm sure you can take it to the next level.
